lj.lj_ly: Her grandson is the apple of her eye.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  æppel, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch appel and German Apfel

entry.def: An apple is a round fruit with smooth green, yellow, or red skin and firm white flesh.
If you say that someone is the apple of your eye, you mean that they are very important to you and you are extremely fond of them.

example.ex: Penny's only son was the apple of her eye.
example.tran: 彭妮的独子是她的心肝宝贝。

means.word_mean: 1. fruit with red or yellow or green skin and sweet to tart crisp whitish flesh
2. native Eurasian tree widely cultivated in many varieties for its firm rounded edible fruits

Sentence.sentence: The reaction to his death, with people leaving candles and flowers outside Apple stores and politicians singing praises on the internet, is proof that Mr Jobs had become something much more significant than just a clever money-maker.
His fall from grace in the 1980s, followed by his return to Apple in 1996 after a period in the wilderness, is an inspiration to any businessperson whose career has taken a turn for the worse

The way in which Mr Jobs revived the failing company he had co-founded and turned it into the world's biggest tech firm (bigger even than Bill Gates's Microsoft, the company that had outsmarted Apple so dramatically in the 1980s), sounds like something from a Hollywood movie.
Taking a step that many professors may view as a bit counterproductive, some colleges and universities are doling out Apple iPhones and Internet-capable iPods to their students.

It is not clear how many colleges and universities plan to give out iPhones and iPods this fall; officials at Apple were unwilling to talk about the subject and said that they would not leak any institution's plans
We can't announce other people's news," said Greg Joswiak, vice president of iPod and iPhone marketing at Apple.

sentences.en: Freshly baked apple pie makes a tasty dessert.
sentences.cn: 新烤的苹果派是很可口的饭后点心。

sentences.en: There are many apple trees here.

jushi.english: The apples were divided among the children.
Green apples are often used in pies.
She kept the largest apple for herself.
jushi.chinese: 她把最大的苹果留给自己。
